edge: Katti Batti is a 2015 Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy film directed by Nikkhil Advani and produced by Siddharth Roy Kapur under the banner of UTV Motion Pictures.
In the film Katti Batti, Imran Khan plays the character Madhav 'Maddy' Kabra, an architect who falls in love with Payal Saluja during college.
In the film Katti Batti, Kangana Ranaut plays the character Payal Saluja, who begins a live-in relationship with Madhav 'Maddy' Kabra (played by Imran Khan) for 5 years until suddenly she leaves him.
In the film Katti Batti, the lead characters Madhav 'Maddy' Kabra (played by Imran Khan) and Payal Saluja (played by Kangana Ranaut) fall in love with each other during college.
In the film Katti Batti, Madhav 'Maddy' Kabra (played by Imran Khan) and Payal Saluja (played by Kangana Ranaut) have a live-in relationship for 5 years.
In the film Katti Batti, it is produced by Siddharth Roy Kapur under the banner of UTV Motion Pictures.
